price: Àti pé dájúdájú nínú Tírà Ìpìlẹ̀ tó wà lọ́dọ̀ Wa, al-Ƙur’ān mà ga, ó sì kún fún ọgbọ́n.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
